description: Dr. Vineet Arya is a practicing vascular surgeon in Dwarka, Delhi. He has over 17 years of experience as a doctor but 10 years as a specialist. He is an associate of Kalpavriksh Super Speciality Center, Dwarka, as a visiting hospital, and Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket East Wing, Delhi. His list of interests includes management of conditions like arterial thrombosis, brain aneurysms, cerebrovascular disorders, deep vein thrombosis, and DVT, among several other conditions. Dr. Arya is an extremely patient-centric physician with a passion for the field of vascular surgery.

list.content: DNB (Peripheral Vascular Surgery)—Sir Ganga Ram Hospital, New Delhi, 2014

2011-2014: DNB Senior Registrar at Sir Ganga Ram Hospital, New Delhi
2014 – Till Date: Consultant at Max Hospital, Saket, New Delhi
